text: is a J-pop duo. The groups members are Takuya Ōhashi (May 9, 1978) and Shintarō Tokita (February 25, 1978). Ōhashi is the singer for the group. He also plays the guitar and harmonica. Tokita plays piano and keyboard. Their style is very heavily-jazz influenced. ==Albums== *2004: *2005: *2006: *2009: *2011: musium Category:J-pop music groups Category:Jazz bands
title: Sukima switch
